definitions.definition: The action of expectorating , of ejecting phlegm or mucus from the throat or lungs by coughing , hawking , or spitting .
That which is expectorated, as phlegm or mucus .

main_definition: ( physiology ) The action of expectorating , of ejecting phlegm or mucus from the throat or lungs by coughing , hawking , or spitting .
secondary_definitions: ( physiology ) That which is expectorated, as phlegm or mucus .
